items.sentence: Tom sits in front of his computer eight hours a day.
Tom softly closed the door and tiptoed over to Mary.
Tom sold some of the potatoes he had bought to Mary.
Tom soon realized there was no way he could do that.
I wonder why we haven\'t run into each other before.
I\'d like to speak with Tom in private for a moment.
If we leave now, we could be back in Boston by 2:30.
Tom was diagnosed with autism and severe depression.
Tom was homesick and wanted to see his family again.
It\'s one of the most beautiful cities in the world.
